remarks: Inference with ~ ax-16 as its conclusion, that doesn't require ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , or ~ ax-12 for its proof.  The hypotheses may be eliminable without one or more of these axioms in special cases.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2008.)
statement:
ax16i.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ax16i.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
ax16i $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph -> A. x ph ) ) $.
$d ph z $.
$d x y z $.
